body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer service team. My name is Ethan Williams, and I represent StayFresh Hotels.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I please have your name so I can assist you better?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Emma Baker.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Emma. Can you please provide me with your reservation number and the email address associated with your booking?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my reservation number is seven eight two four six and my email address is emma.baker@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Emma. Just to confirm, your reservation number is seven eight two four six and your email address is emma.baker@example.com. Is that correct?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for confirming, Emma. I will now look into your checkout concern. Please bear with me for a moment.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your patience and for providing the necessary details, Emma. I will address your checkout issue promptly. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out, Emma. Have a great day! Goodbye.
